WEAPONFOOTER: Stats are for this character with this weapon
WEAPONDESC: No Trials experience for this character with this weapon yet
TRANSLATEEMAIL: Please note that this setting only influences the names of Destiny-related weapons and gear for now. Want to help us translate the entire site to your language? Send us an email!
INCLUDING: Including the chart from latest matches
MAINSTATSDESC: Win percentage, win streak, ELO-rating and lighthouse visits
WEEKSTATSDESC: Stats and weapon usage for this week only
MATCHTABDESC: An overview of the character's last three Trials matches
STATSTABDESC: Character data from the beginning of time
